ygData.subject: RE: Paw of Opalla
ygData.msgSnippet: I know this from MANY hours in Befallen waiting on him.  He or his placeholder spawn right at the entrance.  Not a little way down or anything else,
ygData.messageBody:
I know this from MANY hours in Befallen waiting on him. He or his
placeholder spawn right at the entrance. Not a little way down or anything
else, immediately inside the zone. He then immediately shouts and walks to
the 3rd floor. There are several random spots he can go to on the 3rd
floor. To get him to spawn again (he seems to be between a 20 and 30 min
spawn) you have to find and kill the placeholder on the 3rd floor. You will
know when you have the right one, because they *usually* do the shout again
when you attack them.

Astur il'Ayan, Cleric of Brell
Solusek Ro



-----Original Message-----
From: Jerry Hawkins [mailto:jhawkins@...]
Sent: Friday, October 08, 1999 3:45 PM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Paw of Opalla


Hey Everyone,

I really would like to complete my Paw of Opalla, i TOTALLY lucked in to
the first 3 rings, i camped Mitty for about an hour and she droped the gold
and copper. Picked the silver up in Blackburrow, and now all i need is the
Platinum. Therein lies the problem.

I have heard many differing accounts of where to find Gynok Molter. So,
if you have SEEN him, not heard about him being somewhere, but ACTUALLY SEEN
HIM with YOUR character, please let me know where. Yes, i know Befallen,
but where? First floor in entrance area? Third floor near Elf Skeletons??
Please let me know any visual sightings.

Thanks,

Smeal Stonehammer
22nd Sphere of Life,
Deciple of Rodcet Nife,
Veeshan Existance

played by

Jerry Hawkins
Jhawkins@...
